Warehouse Chief Baxt:
I am Warehouse Chief Baxt of the Iron Gate. I train Scavengers into Bounty Hunters. I am quite busy these days because of the rapidly growing number of Scavengers. Did also you come here to change your occupation to a Bounty Hunter?
Hear information on 2nd occupational change.
